test_build_db module¶

test_build_db.app()[source]¶

Create and configure a new Flask app instance for each test using an in-memory DB.

test_build_db.client(app)[source]¶

A test client for the Flask app.

test_build_db.test_add_build(app, capsys)[source]¶

Test the add_build static method.

Verifies that: - The build is added to the database. - The printed output contains the expected message. - The build_date is properly set.

test_build_db.test_build_instance_creation(app)[source]¶

Test that a Build instance can be created, added to the session, and properly queried.

test_build_db.test_build_table_name()[source]¶

Verify that the Build model has the correct table name.

test_build_db.test_persistence_after_db_shutdown(tmp_path)[source]¶

Test that data persists after a simulated database shutdown/restart.

This test uses a temporary file-based SQLite database to verify that data added in one app context remains available after reinitializing the app.
